pwnEd
3. < Edinburgh University's flagship CTF. />

Event Details

SIGINT is proud to present pwnEd 3, the third iteration of our cybersecurity competition for university students. Running over 2 days, the competition will run as a jeopardy-style CTF with a large variety of challenges covering most categories. We will have great opportunities for networking and socialising with students and industry experts from around the UK.

When?

12th - 13th of March 2022.
Times of day TBA.

Where?

Anywhere on Earth.
Online.

Join our Discord !

Who?

UK university students.
Maximum of 6 per team.

All skill levels welcome. Including beginners!

Many thanks to our event sponsor:

Stay tuned for the sign-up link!

Hosted by SIGINT Edinburgh.
